features: Made from a durable thermoplastic polyurethane (TPU). Rounded design better interfaces with a variety of outsoles. Adjusts to fit different sizes and profiles of footwear
Waterproof and breathable from top to bottom. Lightweight, durable, and packs down easily. Attached lace hook secures fit
Off-set entry provides increased comfort as the ankle flexes. Zipper slider folds down at the top and locks to prevent unzipping. Flap behind zipper offers extra comfort and moisture protection
Toggle lock seals out elements from entering the top of the gaiter. Soft undergarment stitching is comfortable against skin
tech_specs.\u2022 \nFabric: Three-layer GORE-TEX® with polyester face fabric
tech_specs.\u2022 \nCare Instructions: Hand wash cold. Do not use bleach or fabric softeners. Line dry. Do not iron. Do not dry clean
